fields.name: headerErrorScreen
fields.fieldText:
Something went wrong...


Error message:

{!CustomError}

fields.name: displayNoAttendeesNoEmail
fields.fieldText: Since there are no bookings for this event, we will not send any emails

fields.name: Cancellation_Reason_Optional
fields.helpText:
This field is Optional.

This is not sent to the Host, but simply added as a cancellation reason in Calendly.

fields.name: headerScreen2
fields.fieldText: Success

fields.name: displayListEmailInformation
fields.fieldText:
Your List Email Was Sent

See more details â

fields.name: displayCampaignUpdated
fields.fieldText:
The Campaign {!Get_Campaign.Name} was updated to


Status: {!Get_Campaign.Status}

fields.name: displaySelectContactHeader
fields.fieldText:
Select a Contact

We found multiple Contacts related to this Account. Choose the one you wish to proceed with.


Selecting a Contact here, does not mean you're required to send an email in the next window

fields.name: displayHeaderConfirmCancelPending
fields.fieldText:
Cancel Event


This Campaign is currently in status "{!Get_Campaign.Status}"


Are you sure you want to cancel it?


This action cannot be undone

fields.name: displayWaitForCalendlyAction
fields.fieldText:
Awaiting Server


Your Cancellation is being processed, please wait a few seconds...
